images.description: As Momma navigates through the level, she must be careful to keep her ducklings away from any enemies!
Momma first has to find her lost ducklings.
Momma can end up with quite a few ducklings trailing behind her.
An early version of the game included a rope simulation to show the connect between Momma and her followers. The rope would stretch, change color, then snap if the duckling fell too far behind!
The goal of each level is for Momma to lead all her ducklings to a safe pond.

videos.description: A gameplay video for Momma Duck.
